item.description:
Join the Boston Wikipedia crew for dinner and ice cream next Tuesday!
Lots of fun things to discuss, from an upcoming wikiacademy at a nearby University, to reporting on the World Tango Championships, to the future of Wikipedia... and how to stop it.
We'll be meeting at Cuchi Cuchi in Central at 6pm for SUBSIDIZED food and drink (come dressed up in retro costume if you have one), and for ice cream afterwards at Tosci's next door (starting at 7:30).
We will be joined by guest rock stars Jonathan Zittrain (of the band "CompuServe Information Servicemen") and (from the hit series "XXXXXX XXX XXXXXXXX").
Where : Cuchi Cuchi and Tosci's When : Tuesday August 18, 6pm / 7:30pm - 9pm Who : you, me, XXX and JZ
Don't be shy, bring friends and RSVP. (if the crowd gets too big, we'll get some ice cream to go and grab a larger room nearby - I will send out final details on Sunday)
SJ 617 529 4266
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in my tux and pirate hat.
item.name: Dinner & ice-cream w/ guests Jonathan Zittrain & <NAME REDACTED>
